name: Isolated Worlds
description:
by Greg Varadi.Made for Major Jam: Isolation.

This game is about two robots escaping from their own worlds. They never meet in person, however they can help each other to escape by solving puzzles.
Effectively this game is a local coop game, where two players can control their own character, but you can play it alone.

This is my second game jam. I feel like I improved a lot since my first jam. I hope everyone will like the game, and remember stay safe and wash your hands.
